title: [Bug]: ibGL error: failed to load driver iris and sweast
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

libGL error: MESA-LOADER: failed to open swrast (search paths /snap/teams-for-linux/747/gnome-platform/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri)

### What package are you using?

snap

### Version

1.12.7
